title: 112_s3531
content: Amends the Internal Revenue Code, with respect to the tax credit for alternative fuel vehicle refueling property expenditures, to: (1) increase the rate of such credit from 30 to 50 for hydrogen-related alternative fuel vehicles, (2) eliminate the dollar limitation on such credit for hydrogen-related vehicles, (3) allow such credit for off-highway motor vehicles designed for carrying or towing loads, and (4) extend such credit through 2016 for property related to hydrogen. Increases the 30 energy tax credit for investment in fuel cell property to: (1) 50 for fuel cell property used in a combined heat and power system having an energy efficiency percentage of 70 or more, and (2) 40 for fuel cell property having an energy efficiency percentage of at least 60 but less than 70.
